Experiment Method.Assay Method: Calcium Concentration Measurement Using Flow Cytometer

Material used.Description: Cells were treated with rotenone and analyzed for intracellular calcium levels.

Readout description.Result Description: Intracellular calcium concentration decreased by 30% for the variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were conducted for each treatment group.

Technical replicates.Description: Not applicable in this experimental design.

Basic positive control.Description: Negative control was included to ensure specificity of the assay.

Basic negative control.Description: Positive control cells were used to validate the assay setup.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA was used to analyze the data.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Intracellular calcium concentration greater than 150 µM.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Intracellular calcium concentration less than 90 µM.
